about_the_game:
Marble Mechanics, an immersive VR experience, invites you to construct a marble run and simulate the mechanics of marbles running on the track. The track consists of elements that are easily customizable by simply grabbing them. From funnels and loops to spirals, splitters, and both vertical and horizontal turns, these track elements can automatically align themselves for a smooth marble run, making construction fast and easy. Group track elements together so you can grab the entire group. You have the ability to duplicate and delete individual track elements or entire groups, and save favorite groups to the Track Box for reuse at any time. Infinite undo/redo functionality is always available, and you can save your favorite runs for sharing, restoring, and simulating later.

Marble Mechanics Demo does not allow Save and Load, otherwise fully functional.

short_description: Explore building customized marble runs and simulating the mechanics of marbles running down the tracks. Over ten basic track elements most of them infinitely customizable. Undo/redo, grouping and auto-alignment of track elements make game play easy, relaxing, and fun!
